title: Upgrade jetty to 9.3.14.v20161028
description:
Jetty 9.3.14.v20161028 was released on 7th November 2016. Solr is still on 9.3.8 which was released in March. Let's upgrade.

https://dev.eclipse.org/mhonarc/lists/jetty-announce/msg00095.html

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: Patch to upgrade to 9.3.14. All tests and precommit passes. I'll commit this now.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 5228c8e140b080c4881f55cf30a5b6177f833ada in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Shalin Shekhar Mangar
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=5228c8e ]

SOLR-9801: Upgrade jetty to 9.3.14.v20161028
